_aChangeLog.text: -Corrected detail brush clipping in various locations
-Fixed a level crash related to pak file contents
-Further reduced global vertex calls
-Altered environment and local lighting
-Replaced textures in many areas
-Reworked T spawn stairs to a more simple ramp

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Thank you Just1ne for pointing out most of these issues!

_aChangeLog.text: Reduced global Vertex calls in the world space
Added min max fadeout to a number of props
Simplified some func_detail geometry for visibility and performance
Changed a large number of textures to aid vertex buffer limits and visibility
Addressed a large number of console errors upon level load
Reworked some brushes and decal sprites
Re worked minimap
Changed Church layout to ease navigation and help CTs hold a stronger position while allowing Ts to rotate more effectively
Changed cover layout in B site
Removed canopy roof from B site
Changed LoS from B interion to Lobby doors reducing this positions effectiveness
Changed Tree model in A long Yard to ease visibility
Added waist height cover to T Spawn
Widened apartment corridors
Removed stairway window from House
Adjusted most prop foliage density
Made crate jump from sewer to A site slightly harder

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
V.04B will be a last major update for some time.
Please submit suggestions and bug reports in the comments.

_sText:
Beta version of de_clifftop for testing and feedback before finalisation.

I have been working on this map periodically for a little over 2 years going through many changes, overhauls and reworks, there is much more work to do, I hope you enjoy.  Please leave any feedback and criticism below.

Thank you to the lovely members of TheFragHunted for helping me test and make many improvements.  You know who you are <3

Latest Release:: V0.5b

!!Known Issues To Be Fixed Later!!

-No Radar
-Missing detailing / Texture work
-Reduce global vertex calls
-Layout and LoS tweak to B site
-Ease navigation in apartments to lobby stairs
-Clear certain console errors relating to prop collision models
-Triggering the Onion spawn (location 2 or 3) may slightly load the server for a moment
-Minor bugs in geometry
-No custom Nav Mesh
-Minimal Sounscape
-Skybox rework
-Layout changes to Church
-Spawn changes
-Interacting with tree7 (OOB) will grant certain players slightly increased movespeed
-Certain wallbangs tuned
-VVIS recalculation
-Adjustment to encounter timing on map extremities
-Add cover to Tspawn from mid/ct snipers
-Make crate jump from mid connector to A a bit harder
-Static reflection bug in 3dskybox water
-Improve lighting in B courtyard interior
-Missing texture on T spawn stairs
-Pixel gap on T mid arch
-Doorway brush clipping through door prop on A long

Thankyou
